value:
As long as we're all here, we should
have a big competition. We'll see how
good you members of this order are!

I'm a retainer for Lord Takumi.
I wouldn't hesitate to give up my life
if it meant protecting him.

Hey! On patrol? Good work! If you
ever need a hand, just holler, and
then I'll come running!

Say, you free? Then why not train
with me, $Nu!$k$pNeed to keep my arm in swingin'
shape!

Just bought veggies from a pretty
lady. Nah, she didn't overcharge me.
No way pretty ladies would do that!

You're $Nu, right?$k$pYour buddy sent me over to say
hello. Which buddy? Ha! It was
$Nf.

I kinda want to brag to everyone
now.
Oh wow, I'm getting stronger!
I wanted to become even stronger.

This is gonna be an exciting
change!

Name's Hinata! I'm a samurai from
Hoshido. I'm always training with my
katana—got the best slice around!

Hey there! Just wanna throw a
whole bucket of thanks on you for
putting me in battle a lot.$k$pYou know I live for that, and that
sorta thing helps me keep my skills
sharp, $Nu!$k$pHave to admit that when I first
landed here, I was all kinds of
homesick.$k$pI mean, seriously! This place doesn't
have anything good from Hoshido!
No dojos. No miso soup.$k$pBut you know what? I love this
place now, even without
the soup!$k$pGood for a guy to open up to
new things, right? Otherwise,
life's just dull.$k$pBesides, battling strong foes from
so many worlds helps me get
better at protecting Lord Takumi.$k$pHa! Don't think I forgot about you.
Me and my katana? We are
SO here to keep you safe!
そらよ！
どりゃあっ！
おわっ！
Damn it!
Oh, that's it!
Let's get wild!
I've got your back!
Hey, what's up?
Shoot...
Haha
Ha! Might not look it, but I'm actually pretty good at stuff!
Aw, maybe I am a little scruffy. But I give the pits a splash every day!
This realm has such wide, open fields. Man, you gotta love that!
I train really hard—until I'm dead on the floor. Keeps a guy alive!
My blade is devoted to my liege. There's nothing I take more seriously.
Where's Lord Takumi? I gotta protect him no matter what!
I'll always have your back. You just leave it to me, buddy.
All right!
Here I go!
Where to?
